assessment_steps.description: Defined disease mechanism: C-terminal deletion abrogates parkin-membrane association and induces misfolding/aggregation.
Assays (cell phenotype rescue, proteasome degradation) align with disease mechanism.
No specific controls for C-terminal deletion mutant; four missense mutations tested without PS3/BS3 reliance.
No OddsPath calculations; controls unspecified. Strength: BS3_supporting.
Disease mechanism: UBL missense mutations decrease parkin stability, leading to proteasome degradation.
Assays (proteasome degradation) align with disease mechanism.
Assays validated via independent testing without PS3/BS3 reliance.
No OddsPath calculations; controls unspecified. Strength: Max PS3_supporting.
